short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows quickly enable and disabling of other extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickSwitch is a powerful extension for your browser that provides the convenience of quickly enabling and disabling other extensions with a single click. With QuickSwitch, you can efficiently manage all your extensions, increasing productivity and providing better control over your browser.

We have implemented the following features:
Quick On/Off: Instantly enable or disable any extension without having to access the settings menu.
Easy Interface: Simple and intuitive interface for quick access and management.
Productivity: Reduce browser resource consumption by disabling unused extensions.
Uses: QuickSwitch is ideal for professionals, developers, and anyone who wants to keep their extensions clean and organized, optimizing their workspace and increasing productivity.
